Sentencas: The La0.7Sr0.3CrO3 (LSC) powders were prepared using liquid-solid reaction method.
Titulo: Ferritic Stainless Steels Coated a Dense La0.7Sr0.3CrO3 Layer as Interconnects for SOFCs

Sentencas: The LSC ceramic layer was coated by plasma spraying on ferritic stainless steels to form a dense LSC film to resist high temperature oxidation corrosion.
Titulo: Ferritic Stainless Steels Coated a Dense La0.7Sr0.3CrO3 Layer as Interconnects for SOFCs

Sentencas: The results show the crystal phase of the coated layer is perovskite structure and the LSC coated layer is dense and the mass loss of the interconnects is 0.3 mg/cm(2) after heating at 850 degrees C for 60 h.
Titulo: Ferritic Stainless Steels Coated a Dense La0.7Sr0.3CrO3 Layer as Interconnects for SOFCs
